Description: Fantastic 2 bed 1 bath nestled between the Old North Church and Langone Park in the North End! 10 Henchman St Unit 3F is nestled off Commercial Street, featuring beautiful exposed brick, spacious eat in kitchen, and a generous living area. Recently renovated bath, and in building laundry. Close distance to public transportation, Rose Kennedy Greenway, Faneuil Hall and many restaurants! Fully-furnished. Pets conditional.
